sentences.sentence: Gladly, Lord Soth. I will fetch the water myself.
sentences.translation: 我很乐意，索斯爵士。我会亲自去取些水来。

sentences.sentence: Dongguan Nanxing (Soth-star) plastic CO. Ltd has more than 50 years of experience of producing plastic packages.
sentences.translation: 东莞南星塑胶有限公司拥有有超过50年塑料包装生产经验。

sentences.sentence: Soth photographs monks, survivalist, hermits and runaways, but this isn't a conventional documentary book on life "off the grid."
sentences.translation: 他拍摄了包括僧侣、生存主义者、隐士和离家出走的各色人物，但这绝不是传统意义上关于“自闭生活”的纪实作品。
